SA19tarkrsau:3349: 'gardabhānantaraṃ ghūma' iti niyamatvena nirasyate / bhāvitvena śaśaviṣāṇādi /
SA19tarkrsau:3352: atrāpi niyatatvaṃ bahnāveva sati bhāvakāryasya dhūmasya /
SA19tarkrsau:3355: sa ca niyamo bhāvo hetubhāvā bhāvābhyāṃ kāryabhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau /
SA19tarkrsau:3357: 4] bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau 'sarvatra deśe kāle ca sarvadā vahnināntarīyaka eva dhūma' ityavadhāraṇāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3359: na ca sarvajño 'sau na ca na gṛhlāti kāryakāraṇayor niyamam ?
SA19tarkrsau:3360: yadi hi dhūmo nāgnijanyastadā sakṛdapi tato na jāyeta ?
SA19tarkrsau:3368: yadi nīlo dṛśyamāno 'yaṃ deśāntare kālāntare vā na nīla ihāpi varttamāno na nīlo dṛśyeta /
SA19tarkrsau:3370: 'dhūmo 'yaṃ vivakṣitadeśakālayoḥ[562]pāvakānantaraṃ niyatabhābīti bhāvito[563]deśāntare kālāntare ca nānyathā śaṅkanīyaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3382: [564] atra sa iti visargarahitaḥ pāṭho mūlapāṭhe /
SA19tarkrsau:3389: -(pūrvārdhamātraṃ) pra- vā- bhā- 133 pṛ-, 180; 643 pṛ- api /
SA19tarkrsau:3391: 'sa dhūmo yo bahnijanitaḥ, 'sa bahni[566]ryo dhūmajanaka' iti parasparasvabhāvaniyama[P6B/
SA19tarkrsau:3406: 'pi tena pāvakasya śakramūrdhnaśca yadi śaktirekā dhūmajananaṃ prati,
SA19tarkrsau:3408: tadā - - - 'dugdhavāriṇoreva naiva śaktiyoge 'pi pāvakaśakramūrdhnorekarūpatā syādi'ti nirākṛtam - - -
SA19tarkrsau:3417: [568] bhede 'pi yatra........ pratipadyate // -pra- vā- bhā- 260 pṛ, 3/161 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:3426: [570] ityetat kārya... .... .... vastunaḥ // -pra- vā- bhā- 260 pṛ, 3/162 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:3427: [571] jñānānyapi tadhā.......śane / .... vastunaḥ // -pra- vā- kā- 260 pṛ-, 3/162 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:3429: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tanniṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ[572]/ /"
SA19tarkrsau:3431: [572] vastūnāṃ vidyate........ śruti vā- bhā- 361 pṛ-, 3/163 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:3433: pratyeti bhedapramāṇam / sā yataḥ kutaścidekatvaśūnyācchaktādutpadyatāṃ evam- - -
SA19tarkrsau:3443: 'na bhinnalakṣaṇatvād yā pratyabhijñā viruddhadharmādhyāsaśūnyaviṣayā sā pramāṇam /
SA19tarkrsau:3445: tatra viruddhadharmādhyā saśūnyaviṣayatvaṃ pratyabhijñāyāḥ kena siddham ?
SA19tarkrsau:3460: [576] anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma .... ....bhabiṣyati // - -ta- sa- paṃ- 166 pṛ- /
SA19tarkrsau:3462: mahitatvānyadvyāsajjyādivicāramavadhūya viśiṣṭahetuphalābhāvaniyatarūpāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prabandhamekatvenādhyavasīya sa evāhaṃ karomī 'ti vyavaharati yuktameva pravarttate /
SA19tarkrsau:3474: [578] nityaṃ sattvam........kṣaṇāt // -pra- vā- bhā- 293 pṛ-, pra- vā- 3/34 //
SA19tarkrsau:3476: ityatra na vauddhasya nityaṃ sattvam [P6B/5] siddham / tatraivaṃ veditavyam /
SA19tarkrsau:3477: ākādācitkatvaṃ sattvaṃ nityamuktam, na tu sadakāraṇavannityam /
SA19tarkrsau:3482: [580] yathā yathā hi........ tathā / .... vinodayāt // -pra- vā- bhā- 133 pṛ-, 2/180/729 //
SA19tarkrsau:3488: [581] evaṃ kathamaneke.... .... ....bāriṇaḥ / .... dvayorapi // -pra- vā- bhā- 627 pṛ-, 4/253 /
SA19tarkrsau:3489: [582] dravaśakte........ dvayorapi/ / -pra- vā- bhā- 627 pṛ-, 4/253 kā- /

SA19tarkrsau:3499: kārye 'pi kvacid dharma utpadyate / yathā - - - kuḍyāderaktatā /
SA19tarkrsau:3510: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cet saṃ[586]vṛtyāstu yathā tathā[587]/ /[588]
SA19tarkrsau:3513: [587] aśaktaṃ sarvaṃmiti.... .... .... diṣu / ....tathā / -pra- vā- bhā- 182 pṛ-, 3/4 kā- //
SA19tarkrsau:3514: [588] dṛṣṭā śakti........ tathā/ / -pra- vā- bhā- 182 pṛ-, 3/4 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:3519: [589] sāsti sarvatra........ rekayoḥ / .... buddhivat // -pra- vā- bhā- 186 pṛ-, 3/5 kā- /
SA19tarkrsau:3523: tādṛśāmādikāraṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ sarvathā dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ na vyabhicarati kāryātmā [P6A]6] na tu yajjātīyaṃ kāryaṃ tajjātīyameva kāraṇamapi /
SA19tarkrsau:3525: ākārabheda eva kāraṇānāṃ tattvātattvanibandhanam, api tu svabhāvāntaramapi /
SA19tarkrsau:3533: anuvarttakaḥ kāryasya svabhāvo 'nuvarttanīyo yaḥ sa kāraṇasvabhāvaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3551: [594] sāmagrīphalaśaktīnāṃ........ vandhini / .....sambhabāt // - ta- saṃ- paṃ- 3 pṛ- /
SA19tarkrsau:3553: kāryamutpadyate yasmāt sa kāryotpādo yogyatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3555: 6] tpādanayogyatvasya sādhyasya sāmagrīsādhanadharmasattāmātrabhābitbena samagrasya hetoḥ sādhanatayā sammatasya svabhāvahetutvamuktam /
SA19tarkrsau:3557: [595] vo iti likhitvā okāramātrā chinneva mūlapāṭhe /
SA19tarkrsau:3561: tebhyo dvitīye kṣaṇe aṅkurajananayogyāḥ kṣityādayaḥ tatrādyātiśaya vyapadeśaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3562: tadūrdhvam - - -bhāratasyānubandhino dharaṇi-dhāmādayaḥ kāryotpādāt pūrvaṃ sahakārivyapadeśabhājaḥ parasparopakāritvena ekakāryakāritvena ca /
SA19tarkrsau:3566: sahaiva kurvanti / parasparāpekṣāṃ kurvanti / apekṣatā ca kāryatā /
SA19tarkrsau:3568: [596]parasparamupakurvantaḥ kurvanti kāryam / kimanayā kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā ? kāryameva kiṃ nānumīyate ?
SA19tarkrsau:3573: na sahāmahe punaḥ, kāranaiḥ kāryasya vyabhicārāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3574: ādyātiśayakrameṇa sāmagrīphalabhūtāḥ yāḥ śaktayaḥ, tāsāṃ pariṇāmastāvat /
SA19tarkrsau:3575: tasya matāntare ca pratibandhavaikalyayoḥ sambhavena kārye kāraṇānāṃ vyabhicāraḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3579: yogyatāyāmapi ātmīyābhiniveśapūrvakā rāgādayo na dehendriyabuddhimātrā bhavitumarhati /
SA19tarkrsau:3580: ādyātiśayalakṣaṇayogyatā prathamopanipatitāt samagrād bhavati / asamagrāt kāraṇānupalavdhyā nāsti /
SA19tarkrsau:3582: dehādīnāṃ hetutve 'pi na kevalānāṃ sāmarthyamastīti vipakṣavṛtteradṛṣṭāvapi śeṣavadanumānāt saṃśayaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3592: nāntarīyakameva kāryaṃ kāraṇamanumāpayet / tat prativandhānnānyad vipakṣe 'darśane 'pi /
SA19tarkrsau:3606: kadācid dveṣasyāpi snigdhaṃ rūrkṣa ca vacanaṃ kāryam /
SA19tarkrsau:3608: kāryamātrād vacanamātrād rāgasya viśiṣṭasya kāraṇasyānumānaṃ pramāṇābhāsam rāgamantareṇāpi vacanasya sambhavāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3610: pakvānyetāni phalāni madhurarasāni vā samānarūpatvādekaśākhāprabhāvād vā upayuktaphalavat /
SA19tarkrsau:3612: bahulaṃ pākada[P6B/7]rśane 'pi na sthālyantargamanamātreṇa pākaḥ sidhyati- - -
SA19tarkrsau:3634: sarva eva vastusambandhā janakasyeva prayogaviśeṣavaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād vyavasthāpyante /
SA19tarkrsau:3647: yaḥ punaraviśeṣeṇa sarvasya tasya kāraṇamātrādeva bhāvo, yathā-vastutvasya /
SA19tarkrsau:3651: dṛṣṭanivṛttīnāṃ vā bhāvānaṃ yathā nāśo hetvantarānapekṣo janmānantaraṃ vyavahtriyate /
SA19tarkrsau:3655: rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ vināśadarśanena teṣu ca [607]deśakālāntariteṣu yadi kṛtakeṣu śaṅkā syād dṛṣṭasteṣāṃ sbabhāvena vināśo virudhyeta /
SA19tarkrsau:3663: yadi nāma kālo nāma mahābhūtādivyatirikto nāsti tathāpi taireva vyavahāro bhaviṣyati /
SA19tarkrsau:3672: tasmādiyamanapekṣā bināśaṃ prati / kṛtakatvasya viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇam /
SA19tarkrsau:3673: yato rūpādīnāṃ yadi deśakālāvasthāsu kāsu[609]cideva vināśaḥ syāt,
SA19tarkrsau:3674: tadā tatsāpekṣo vināśo nirapekṣatayā pratīto na syāt /
SA19tarkrsau:3700: sa kriṃ svabhābo 'stu yuṣmākam? yasmād bauddhairavadhṛto dravyādipadārthagaṇaḥ /
SA19tarkrsau:3707: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho nāsti bhāvataḥ /"
SA19tarkrsau:3712: "rūpaśleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sati kathaṃ bhavet ?
